title: Test
yAxis: Average number of working hours per week
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Form of Employment, and Average number of working hours per week in each Form of Employment on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Self-employed where Average number of working hours per week is 35.4.
The lowest category is found at Temporary employed where Average number of working hours per week is 25.5.
